entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
